name: 2nd Global Summit on Brain Disorders and Therapeutics
content: The 2nd Global Summit on Brain Disorders and Therapeutics, we are delighted to welcome you to join the Conference scheduled on June 27-28, 2022 Prague, Czech Republic which is an exceptional gathering for the worldwide prominent scholastics in the field of Brain disorders and Therapeutics where Directors, Scientists, Professors, Research scholars, Postdocs, Academic Staff are about to share their research work and acquiesce new emerging technological trends in the conference areas.
